sentences.en: It was kismet _ a combination of several events occurring to perfect karma.
sentences.cn: 那就是命运——一连串事件的姻缘巧合.

sentences.en: Omar and I were meant for each other. It was kismet.
sentences.cn: 我和奥玛是天作之合，这是命运的安排啊。

sentences.en: That's fate , kismet, and we're back in the world of fantasy.
sentences.cn: [这是命运, 我们活在白日梦的世界里.

sentences.en: The Kismet wireless sniffer is an 802.11 b network sniffer and network dissector.
sentences.cn: Kismet无线嗅探器是一种802.11b网络嗅探器及网络剖析器.

trans.tran_en: the things that will happen to you in your life
